creator: Dorling Kindersley
descriptionHtml:
English for Everyone Junior is an interactive and fun English-language course for children aged 6–9.

The English for Everyone Junior app provides offline access to the audio recordings that accompany the coursebook. Learn to read and speak more than 500 words.

The app contains more than 90 minutes of high-quality audio, including 16 entertaining songs for children to sing along with. All the key language from the course is clearly spoken by native English speakers – UK and US editions are available.

The course provides preparation for the Cambridge (Pre-A1 Starters) and Trinity GESE (Grade 1) exams.

Please note that the English for Everyone Junior app is designed to support a printed coursebook. For more information, visit dkefe.com/junior. An internet connection is required to download audio content.

For DK’s adult English-language learning, visit dkefe.com.
descriptionShort: English for Everyone is the easiest way to teach yourself the English language.
